A.title: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs)
A.instructions: This section contains of 20 part questions and all are to be answered. Each question carries one mark. This section 'A' of Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) must be solved on the provided OMR sheet. The correct answer bubble must be filled on OMR sheet. Use only blue/black ball point pen on OMR sheet. Avoid pencil / White-o pen / correction pen / ink remover and gel pen to solve the questions on OMR sheet.

questions.question: Albert Einstein was awarded Nobel Prize for:

The idiom 'Achilles heel' means a:
The word 'dupe' means:

B.title: Short Answer Questions
B.instructions: Attempt Ten part-questions from this section, selecting at least Two part questions from each sub-section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: Why was Mrs. Oakentubb trying to hide her identity from the man?
How has Oscar Wilde portrayed the character of Little Hans?
What initial problems were faced by Pakistan in its early years as mentioned by Liaquat Ali Khan in his speech?
What is Einstein's idea of human freedom?
Describe the last scene of man's life in the poem, 'The Seven Ages of Man'.
What does Thomas Campion's upright man think about worldly life?
How does Ulysses motivate his fellow mariners to set out in search of a newer world?
Why does G. Allana feel that he has become a different man as compared to that of his early life?
Give description of the loyalty and wisdom of Colonel Sapt.
Why was Black Michael not eligible to become the king of Ruritania?
How does Rassendyll behave as the king when he takes part in the procession before the coronation?
Why did lady De Mauban extend support to Rudolf Rassendyll?
Use any Two of the following pair of words in your sentences: brake, break; prey, pray; merry, marry; knight, night; whole, hole; sea, see.
Use any Two of the following phrasal verbs in your sentences: look forward to, wind up, pass away, turn down, make out
Match any Four of the following words of column 'A' with the meanings in column 'B'

C.title: Detailed Answer Questions
C.instructions: Answer all questions from this section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: Write a character sketch of Rudolf Rassendyll. OR Give the critical analysis of the poem, 'The Solitary Reaper'.
Write an essay on any one of the following topics: (i) Technology - Pros and Cons (ii) Why I like Reading Books (iii) Importance of Tree Plantation (iv) Effects of Media on Society
Change the narration of the given sentences.
Read the following passage and answer the questions given below.
